kpi_info.title: Paging attempt with TMSI fail
kpi_info.use: Not in use. The number of paging attemptwith TMSI for failed pagings (ATT#(FAIL)) counters show how many paging requests were sent to the A and Iu interfaces (from MSC) per LAC when the paging failed. This counter contains the paging of both Normal and Telemetric subscribers. Searchings, PS domain pagings are not included in this counter. This counter is not updated when the subscriber is busy during the paging.
